net.itca.dwm.core

Class ActiveSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.itca.dwm.core.ActiveSession

  • public class ActiveSession
extends java.lang.Object
    An active session that guards data throughout the session. Can be used to cache data. Singleton.
    Author:
    Dylan
